Class ProxiedFileSystemWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.util.ProxiedFileSystemWrapper
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class ProxiedFileSystemWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper class for generating a file system as a proxy user.

      • getProxiedFileSystem

        public org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem getProxiedFileSystem(gobblin.configuration.State properties,
                                                            ProxiedFileSystemWrapper.AuthType authType,
                                                            java.lang.String authPath,
                                                            java.lang.String uri)
                                                     throws java.io.IOException,
                                                            java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                                            java.net.URISyntaxException
        Deprecated. 
        Getter for proxiedFs, using the passed parameters to create an instance of a proxiedFs.
        Parameters:
        properties -
        authType - is either TOKEN or KEYTAB.
        authPath - is the KEYTAB location if the authType is KEYTAB; otherwise, it is the token file.
        uri - File system URI.
        Returns:
        proxiedFs
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.net.URISyntaxException
